HOME.WELCOME: Welcome to iTràmits, the official platform of ADR Balears for the management of grants and subsidies
HOME.WELCOME_P1: This application allows for the management and submission of grant applications for industrial companies in the Balearic Islands, administered by the Regional Development Agency of the Balearic Islands (ADR Balears).
HOME.WELCOME_P2: The grands, subsidies and procedures currently managed by ADR Balears include
HOME.WELCOME_P3: Xecs de Consultoria: subsidies to finance consultancy hours for industrial companies, with the aim of drawing up and designing digital transformation plans, as well as improvement plans aimed at resolving possible inefficiencies, overproduction, warehouse management, among other operational aspects.
HOME.WELCOME_P4: Ibavals Indústria: ADR Baleares and the Sociedad de Garantía Recíproca ISBA SGR offer industrial companies Ibavals Indústria, a line of financing to facilitate access to a loan to invest in improving industrial production.
HOME.WELCOME_P5: Industria Local Sostenible (ILS): is a guarantee mark created by ADR Balears to identify and make visible the industries of the Balearic Islands committed to the environment that are involved in the calculation of the carbon footprint and its reduction.

HEADER.TITLE: Welcome
HEADER.CONVODATA:
Destination: AGENCIA DE DESARROLLO REGIONAL DE LES ILLES BALEARS
Issuer (DIR3): A04003714
Codi SIA: %CODIGOSIA%
Convocatòria: %CONVO%
HEADER.CONVODETAILS: Call for the granting of aid for consultancy cheques to promote industry in the Balearic Islands in the areas of digitisation, internationalisation, sustainability and advanced management.

FORM.ACCEPTTERMS1: I have read and accept the privacy policy
FORM.ACCEPTTERMS2: You may exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, and others, as detailed in the privacy policy.
FORM.ACCEPTTERMS3: The personal data provided will be processed by ADR Balears as the data controller, for the purpose of managing your request.
FORM.REQUIREDDOCUMENTATION:
Before starting, we recommend having the following documentation ready, as it will be requested throughout this assistant:

In the case of individuals (self-employed):
Description of the company and its activity, business model, and needs depending on the program being applied for.
Certificate of registration in the RETA or an equivalent alternative regime.
Updated certificate of registration in the IAE at the time of application.
Certificate of being up to date with tax obligations with the State Tax Administration Agency AEAT.
In the case of legal entities (SMEs):
Description of the company and its activity, business model, and needs depending on the program being applied for.
Certificate of being up to date with tax obligations with the AEAT.
Updated certificate of IAE at the time of application.
Copy of the company's NIF.
Public deed and bylaws, duly registered in the corresponding registry.
Reliable document accrediting the representation of the person acting on behalf of the applicant entity.
AUTHORIZATIONS: the application implies authorization (Article 28.2 of Law 39/2015) for the ADR Balears to verify ex officio that the applicant is up to date with obligations to the ATIB and the TGSS, except in the case of express denial. In this case, the beneficiary must provide the following documentation:
NIF of the applicant and/or the authorized person and supporting documents, if necessary.
Certificate of being up to date with payments to the ATIB.
Certificate of being up to date with payments to the TGSS.
FORM.PROGRAM: Select the support programme(s) you are applying for
FORM.SELECTPROGRAMS: Select one or more grant or subsidiaries programms
FORM.SELECTIAE: Select the CNAE activity that corresponds to you
FORM.CONSULTANTDATADESCRIPTION: Enter some information about the consultant.
FORM.CONSULTANTCOMPANY: Company name of the consultancy firm
FORM.AUTHORISATIONSSINO: Your authorization is requested to consult the following documents. You may accept or reject this request.
FORM.CCOPTION1: Option 1 - IBAN of the account for Spain (ES99999999999999999999999)
FORM.RESPONSIBLEDECLARATIONEXPANDED: I declare that I meet the legal and regulatory requirements set out in the call, and that the information and documentation provided are accurate. The beneficiary company meets the conditions to operate in the Balearic Islands.
FORM.SMALLBUSINESSINFO: A small enterprise is considered to be one that has less than 50 employees, an annual turnover or an annual balance sheet total not exceeding €10 million, and does not hold 25% or more of its capital or voting rights and other enterprises that do not qualify as SMEs in accordance with Annex I of the European Commission Regulation (EC) No. 651/2014.
FORM.MEDIUMBUSINESSINFO: A medium-sized enterprise is considered to be an enterprise that has between 50 and 250 employees, an annual turnover between EUR 10 million and EUR 50 million or an annual balance sheet total between EUR 10 million and EUR 43 million, and does not hold 25% or more of its capital or voting rights in other companies that do not meet the above requirements.
FORM.NOTIFICATIONCHANELDESCRIPTION: Enter your contact information to receive notifications.
FORM.NOTIFICATIONCHANELINFO: In accordance with section 17 of the call, notifications and communications to the applicant will be carried out telematically to the e-mail address designated by the applicant for notification purposes in this application form. Notices of the availability of the notification to the Citizen Folder of the Punto de Acceso General electrónico (Mi carpeta) will be sent to the e-mail address designated in the declarant's data.
FORM.RESPONSIBLEDECLARATIONDESCRIPTION: Please read the following responsible statements.
FORM.DOCUMENTATIONDESCRIPTION: Please attach the documents requested below.
FORM.DOCUMENTATIONINFOFORMAT: In order for the attached documents to be accepted, they must be in the format indicated below and with a maximum size of 10MB. In addition, below you will find some aids to help you upload documents easily:
FORM.DOCUMENTATIONINFOCTRL: When the files are not in a row in the folder or are not in the same folder, press the CTRL key and, without releasing it, mark the corresponding files with the mouse.
FORM.DOCUMENTATIONINFOSHIFT: When the files are in a row in the same folder, press the SHIFT key and, without releasing and using the mouse, mark the first and the last file, so that they are all selected.
FORM.WEBSITEDETAILS: Company website (do not include the prefix https:// or http://)
FORM.VIDEODETAILS: Company video (do not include the prefix https:// or http://)
FORM.FECHA_MAXIMA_ENMIENDA: Deadline for amendment (date of notification of request + 30 calendar days)
FORM.fecha_limite_consultoria: Fecha límite para realizar la consultoría
FORM.fecha_limite_justificacion: Fecha límite para justificar la ayuda recibida
FORM.FECHA_FIRMA_PROPUESTA_RESOLUCION_PROV: Date of proposed provisional resolution signature
FORM.FECHA_NOT_PROPUESTA_RESOLUCION_PROV: Date of notification of proposed provisional resolution
FORM.FECHA_FIRMA_PROPUESTA_RESOLUCION_DEF: Date of proposed final resolution signature (Upon signing the final PR)
FORM.FECHA_NOT_PROPUESTA_RESOLUCION_DEF: Date of notification of proposed final decision
FORM.FECHA_FIRMA_RES_PAGO_JUST: Date of payment decision and justification signature
FORM.FECHA_NOT_RES_PAGO: Date of notification of payment decision and justification
FORM.FECHA_INF_INICIO_REQ_JUSTIF: Date of report start of request justification
FORM.FECHA_NOT_REQ_JUST: Date of notification of requirement justification
FORM.FECHA_PROPUESTA_REV: Date of proposed resolution of revocation
FORM.FECHA_NOT_PR_REVOCACION: Date of proposed resolution of revocation notification
FORM.FECHA_NOT_R_REVOCACION: Date of resolution of revocation notification
FORM.FECHA_MAXIMA_ENMIENDA_ISBA: Deadline for amendment (date of notification of request + 10 calendar days)

ISBA.TITLE: Aid for financial expenses through the ISBA guarantee

INFO.BANNER: Applications may be submitted once the interested party has formalized the guarantee with the collaborating entity ISBA SGR (point 9.3 of the call).
INFO.DESTINATION: Destination: AGÈNCIA DE DESENVOLUPAMENT REGIONAL DE LES ILLES BALEARS
INFO.PROCEDURE: Form or procedure: Application for aid to micro, small and medium-sized industrial companies in the Balearic Islands that have approved financial operations guaranteed by ISBA SGR, to cover the financial costs of financing operations for productive investments, energy efficiency and digital transformation foreseen in the Industrial Strategic Plan 2018-2025.

ISBA.REQUIREDDOCINFO: Before starting, it is advisable to have the following documentation ready:
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC1: The standard grant application document for this call, which is generated at the end of this wizard by clicking on the 'Send' button and which you will receive by e-mail.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC2: Description of the company and its activity, business model and details of the expected investment/investments.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC3: Responsible declaration of the veracity of the bank data provided, which is included in the application for aid.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC4PART2: certificate updated at the time of application.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC5INFO: In case the applicant is a natural person, the following will be required:
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC5DOC: The certificate of being in the special regime of self-employed workers or in an equivalent alternative regime.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC6INFO: In case the applicant is a legal entity, it will be required:
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC6DOC1: Public deed and bylaws, duly registered in the corresponding registry.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC6DOC2: Reliable document accrediting the representation of the person acting on behalf of the applicant entity. The representation may be accredited by any legally valid form.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC7: Regarding the DNI/NIE of the applicant and/or the person representing him/her, the application for aid will imply the authorization for the ADR Balears to verify his/her personal identity data ex officio. In case of express refusal of consent, it will be necessary to provide this documentation.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC8PART1: With respect to the accreditation of regional tax obligations with the
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC8PART2: and Social Security obligations, the application for aid will imply authorization for
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC8PART5: the information regarding compliance with these obligations, except in the case of express refusal of consent, in which case the applicant person or entity must provide the corresponding certificate, together with the application for aid.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC9: Regarding the accreditation of the requirement of being up to date with the tax obligations with the State Agency of the Tax Administration, the certificate of compliance with this obligation must be provided.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC10: For grants of more than €30,000, the certificate established in Article 13.3 bis of Law 38/2003 of November 17 must be provided.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC11: The certificate of the reciprocal guarantee company that guarantees the financial operation that accredits the date of entry of the beneficiary's request for the guarantee on the financial operation to be subsidized.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC13: The contract or document of guarantee of the financial operation.
ISBA.REQUIREDDOC14: A Declaration of Responsibility, included in the standard application form, from the owner of the company or the person legally representing it.
ISBA.NOTIFICATIONINFO: At the end of this procedure, you will receive by e-mail a pdf document containing:
ISBA.NOTIFICATIONDOC1: The standard grant application document of this call for proposals.
ISBA.NOTIFICATIONDOC2: A responsible declaration of the person who owns the company or who legally represents it.
ISBA.PHONEREPRESENTANTE: Contact phone number of the legal representative
ISBA.FINANCIALDATADESCRIPTION: Enter some data of the financial operation.
ISBA.AVALTERM: Term of the ISBA, SGR guarantee (in years)
ISBA.AVALAMOUNT: Amount of the ISBA, SGR guarantee (€)
ISBA.PROJECTBUDGETDESCRIPTION: Enter some data about the investment and your budget.
ISBA.PROJECTINILS: At the time of application, is your company a member of the ILS program?
ISBA.INILSYESINFO: In the event that the applicant company is a member of the ILS (Local Sustainable Industry) program: The amount of the aid to cover the cost of the guarantee of the financial operations of productive investments will cover the seven years of the original operation, and are: 100% of the cost of the guarantee the seven years of the operation, with the limitation of 1.25% on the amount of the guarantee.
ISBA.INTERESTSUBSIDY: A subsidy to the cost of ISBA's guarantee, consisting of the amount of
ISBA.COSTSUBSIDY: A subsidy to the cost of ISBA's guarantee, consisting of the amount of
ISBA.STARTSTUDYSUBSIDY: A grant for start-up and study expenses, consisting of the amount of
ISBA.REQUEST: I request a grant in the amount of
ISBA.REQUESTINFO: In accordance with the call for the year 2025 for aid to industrial companies with activity in the Balearic Islands to cover the opening and study commissions, interest and the cost of the guarantee for financing operations for productive investments, approved by Resolution of the Minister of Enterprise, Employment and Energy, the corresponding amounts for the operation, guaranteed by the ISBA reciprocal guarantee company, are as follows:
ISBA.DECLARATION1: The truthfulness of the data provided in this application.
ISBA.DECLARATION2: That the applicant qualifies as a small or medium-sized enterprise, in accordance with Annex 1 of Commission Regulation (EU) No. 651/2014 of 17 June 2014 declaring certain categories of aid compatible with the internal market in application of Articles 107 and 108 of the Treaty, meets the requirements to be considered an SME.
ISBA.DECLARATION3: That the beneficiary person or entity is not subject to any cause of prohibition or incompatibility to receive the aid according to the legislation in force and that the applicant has not been sanctioned or convicted by administrative resolution or final court sentence for wage discrimination, moral harassment or any type of unequal treatment, based on sex, in the field of labor relations.
ISBA.DECLARATION4: That the applicant is going to carry out the investment activity, as well as the justification of the realization of the activity and the fulfillment of the requirements and conditions that determine the granting of the subsidy.
ISBA.DECLARATION5: That it has not requested or received any other aid from any other entity, public or private, national or foreign, related to the financial operation or the investment project; or, if not, a list of all aid and subsidies requested or received.
ISBA.DECLARATION5NO: List of all grants and subsidies requested or received.
ISBA.DECLARATION6: That the applicant complies with Commission Regulation (EU) No. 1407/2013 of 18 December 2013 on the application of Articles 107 and 108 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union for the minimis aid.
ISBA.DECLARATION7: That the applicant has declared the aid received during the current fiscal year and the two previous fiscal years.
ISBA.DECLARATION8: That the applicant has the capacity of sufficient representation, duly accredited, to carry out the indicated procedure.
ISBA.DECLARATION9: That in the case of being a self-employed person, the applicant complies with the requirement relating to no more than 25% shareholding in one or more enterprises, or otherwise state that it is an 'associated' enterprise or a 'linked' enterprise and that it reports shareholdings of 25% or more of the share capital or voting rights in other enterprises in the terms set out in Article 3 of Annex 1 of Commission Regulation (EU) No. 651/2014 of 17 June 2014. In case of being an enterprise, 'associated' enterprise or a 'linked' enterprise, declares that the resulting group of enterprises considered 'single enterprise' still meets the requirements to be an SME, as indicated in the definition in section 2.3 of this call.
ISBA.DECLARATION10: That, on the date of the application, it is up to date with the payments of its tax obligations with the State Administration, the administration of the Autonomous Community of the Balearic Islands, as well as up to date with the payments of its tax obligations with the Social Security.
ISBA.DECLARATION11: That the applicant is going to carry out the investment activity in a work center of the Autonomous Community of the Balearic Islands, as well as the justification of the realization of the activity and the fulfillment of the requirements and conditions that determine the concession of the subsidy.
ISBA.DECLARATION12: That for grants of more than 30,000 euros in accordance with Law 28/2003, of November 17, General Subsidies Law; the applicant complies with the deadlines set forth in Law 3/2004 of December 29, establishing measures to combat late payment in commercial transactions.
ISBA.DECLARATION13: That the applicant complies with the conditions of the call.
ISBA.DOC1: The standard grant application document for this call, which is generated when submitting this application.
ISBA.DOC2: Description of the company and its activity and details of the planned investment/investments. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC3: Responsible declaration of the veracity of the bank data according to CAIB model. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC4: BAT certificate updated at the time of application. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC5DOC: Certificate of being in the special regime for self-employed workers or in an equivalent alternative regime. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC6DOC1: Public deed and bylaws, duly registered in the corresponding registry.
ISBA.DOC6DOC2: Reliable document accrediting the representation of the person acting on behalf of the applicant entity. The representation may be accredited by any legally valid form.
ISBA.DOC7INFO: Regarding the DNI/NIE of the applicant and/or the person representing him/her, the application for aid will imply the authorization for ADR Balears to verify his/her personal identity data ex officio. In case of express refusal of consent, it will be necessary to provide this documentation.
ISBA.DOC7LABEL: DNI/NIE of the applicant and/or the person representing him/her. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC8INFO: Regarding the accreditation of regional tax obligations with the Tax Agency of the Balearic Islands and Social Security obligations, the application for aid will imply the authorization for ADR Balears to obtain from the Tax Agency of the Balearic Islands and the General Treasury of the Social Security the information related to the fulfillment of these obligations, except in the case of express refusal of consent, in which case the applicant person or entity must provide the corresponding certificate.
ISBA.DOC8LABEL: Certificate of compliance with tax obligations of ATIB and Social Security. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC9: Certificate of being up to date with tax obligations with the State Agency of Tax Administration (AEAT). [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC10: For grants of more than 30,000 euros, attach the certificate established in article 13.3 bis of Law 38/2003 of November 17. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC11: The certificate of the reciprocal guarantee company that guarantees the financial operation that accredits the date of entry of the application of the beneficiary requesting the guarantee on the financial operation to be subsidized. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC13: Contract or document of endorsement of the financial operation. [.pdf, .jpeg, .png]
ISBA.DOC14: A Responsible Declaration, included in the standard application form, from the person who owns the company or who legally represents it, which is generated when sending this application.

ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.TITLE: Administrative acts

ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.PROPPUESTARESOLUCIONPROVISIONALFAVORABLE: Provisional favorable resolution proposal with requirement
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.PROPUESTARESOLUCIONPROVISIONALDESFAVORAB: Provisional unfavorable resolution proposal with requirement
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.PROPUESTARESOLUCIONDEFINITIVAFAVORABLECO: Final favorable resolution proposal with requirement
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.PROPUESTARESOLUCIONDEFINITIVADESFAVORABL: Final unfavorable resolution proposal with requirement
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.RESOLUCIONDESESTIMIENTORENUNCIA: Resolution of withdrawal due to resignation
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.PROPUESTARESOLUCIONREVOCACIONNOJUSTIFICA: Proposed resolution of revocation for failure to justify
ACTOSADMINISTRATIVOS.RESOLUCIONREVOCACIONNOJUSTIFICAR: Resolution revocation for failure to justify
